title: 300+ Funny Nurse Sayings to Make Everyone Laugh

steps.title: Share a funny nurse quote or saying to lift spirits and alleviate stress.
steps.content: Share a funny nurse quote or saying to lift spirits and alleviate stress. If youâ€™re feeling a bit down in the middle of your shift, some good olâ€™ nurse humor can act as a coping mechanism and brighten your mood . Here are the funniest nurse sayings and quotes to get you through the day (or night): [1] X Research source â€œThe only thing crazier than a nurseâ€™s schedule is a patientâ€™s prognosis.â€ â€œTreat the patient as a whole, not just the hole in the patient.â€ â€” Unknown â€œA shift in nursing is like a box of chocolates, unpredictable and sometimes messy.â€ â€œIâ€™m a nurse. My patience is limited, and Iâ€™ve already used most of it on my patients.â€ â€œYou can tell when a patient is feeling better when she starts to wear makeup.â€ â€” Jenn Oâ€™Keefe â€œBe nice to your nurse. Theyâ€™re the person who chooses your catheter size.â€ â€” Unknown â€œNurse: The first person you see after saying, â€˜Hold my beer and watch this!â€™â€ â€” Unknown â€œIâ€™ve come to the realization that Iâ€™ll touch anything as long as I have gloves on.â€ â€” Unknown â€œMay your scrubs be comfy, your coffee be strong, and your Monday be short.â€ â€” Unknown â€œEvery nurse has a best friend, Pam: LorazePAM, DiazePAM, and ClonazePAM.â€ â€” Unknown â€œThe nurse that can smile when things go wrongâ€¦ is probably going off duty.â€ â€” Unknown â€œWhy yes, I do marathons. Itâ€™s called a 12.5+ hour nurse shift run 3 times a week.â€ â€” Unknown â€œNurses are the only people who can keep a straight face while asking about your poop schedule.â€ â€œWhen I heard 2020 was going to be the year of the nurse, it was not what I expectedâ€¦â€ â€” Unknown â€œThey can put up with me, so you know thatâ€™s a good company.â€ â€” Olivia Mason, Care Options for Kids LPN â€œYou know youâ€™re a nurse when your finger has gone places you never thought possible.â€ â€” Unknown â€œI love being a nurse, but I mostly love wearing scrubs. Theyâ€™re basically professional pajamas.â€ â€” Unknown â€œNursing is a tough job. I mean, where else can you get paid to wake people up and ask them if theyâ€™ve pooped?â€ â€œSometimes I have to remind myself around my non-nurse friends not to talk about bodily functions.â€ â€” Unknown â€œ3 AM: The time when you remember you forgot to chart that thing, bring that lady her water, or pass that med.â€ â€” Unknown â€œThe 3 words most people want to hear: â€˜I love you.â€™ The 3 words nurses want to hear: â€˜Alert, Oriented, and Ambulatory.â€ â€” Unknown â€œYou know you work in healthcare when you can discuss puke and bowel movements at the lunch table and no one flinches.â€ â€” Unknown â€œDonâ€™t let anyone treat you like an expired 24 butterfly gauge. You are a #16 in the left forearm with excellent venous return!â€ â€” Unknown â€œBeing a nurse is weird. I can keep a poker face through trauma but have a mental breakdown over losing my favorite pen.â€ â€” Unknown â€œYou know that feeling when you meet someone and your heart skips a beat? Yeah, thatâ€™s arrhythmia. You can die from that.â€ â€” Unknown â€œHow can anybody hate nurses? Nobody hates nurses. The only time you hate a nurse is when theyâ€™re giving you an enema.â€ â€” Warren Beatty â€œOnce a nurse, always a nurse. No matter where you go or what you do, you can never truly get out of nursing. Itâ€™s like the Mafiaâ€¦ you know too much.â€ â€“ Deb Gauldin, RN

steps.title: Get a quick laugh with a short and funny nurse saying.
steps.content: Get a quick laugh with a short and funny nurse saying. A quick shot of humor is the perfect way to decompress after a high-pressure moment or emotionally intense situation. Here are some short and sweet nurse sayings to keep your spirits up: [2] X Research source â€œPutting the â€˜RNâ€™ in â€˜really not okay.â€™â€ â€œMed cartâ€™s a mess, but so is my life.â€ â€œItâ€™s not hoarding if itâ€™s medical supplies.â€ â€œNurses: Here to save your butt, not kiss it.â€ â€œA nurseâ€™s blood type? Coffee.â€ â€” Unknown â€œHospice nurses do it till you die.â€ â€” Unknown â€œIâ€™m a nurseâ€”nothing scares me.â€ â€” Unknown â€œI might look calm, but Iâ€™m spiraling on the inside.â€ â€œA nurseâ€™s superpower? Multitasking!â€ â€” Unknown â€œIâ€™m a nurse. Whatâ€™s your superpower?â€ â€” Unknown â€œRN stands for refreshments and narcotics.â€ â€” Unknown â€œNightshift nurse: Keeping â€˜em alive til 7:05.â€ â€” Unknown â€œI may be short, but my reach goes far.â€ â€” Maya Angelou â€œI became a nurse for the fame and fortune.â€ â€” No one ever â€œNurses canâ€™t fix stupidâ€¦ but we can sedate it.â€ â€” Unknown â€œI whisper to myself, â€˜Iâ€™m a nurseâ€™ when I question my sanity.â€ â€œA nurse's mind: Like a browser with 30 tabs open at all times.â€ â€œYou canâ€™t fix crazy, all you can do is document it.â€ â€” Unknown â€œI use the Nurseâ€™s Eye Rollâ€”more effective than any medication.â€ â€œWho needs a gym membership when you're lifting patients all day?â€ â€œNo, I will not rub your feet. I am a nurse, not a masseur.â€ â€” Unknown â€œBe nice to nurses. They keep the doctor from accidentally killing you.â€ â€œIâ€™m a nurse because â€˜miracle workerâ€™ isnâ€™t an official title.â€ â€” Unknown â€œSave one life, youâ€™re a hero. Save a hundred lives, youâ€™re a nurse.â€ â€” Unknown â€œDonâ€™t mess with me â€” I get paid to poke people with sharp objects.â€ â€” Unknown â€œA new nurse gets scared when a doctor yells. An old nurse yells back.â€ â€” Unknown â€œIf I collapse at work, hereâ€™s a list of doctors I donâ€™t want working on me!â€ â€” Unknown â€œI have restraints and Ativan, and Iâ€™m not afraid to use them.â€ â€” Deborah Barnes, RN â€œNot saying Iâ€™m a big deal, but the government classifies me as essential.â€ â€” Unknown â€œRemember, Iâ€™m a nurse. Youâ€™re going to have to say a lot to gross me out.â€ â€” Unknown

steps.title: Highlight your stress and lack of sleep with a funny nursing school saying.
steps.content: Highlight your stress and lack of sleep with a funny nursing school saying. Are you (barely) surviving on caffeine and chaos? Then, the following sayings will truly speak to you! Here are some funny sayings for nursing students of all years and degrees: [3] X Research source â€œSleep is for the licensed.â€ â€œStudy. Cry. Clinicals. Repeat.â€ â€œBlood, sweat, and flash cards.â€ â€œIn nursing school, coffee is a food group.â€ â€œNursing school: Where caffeine is a vital sign.â€ â€œAnatomy taught me where my soul used to be.â€ â€œScrubs: The official uniform of the sleep deprived.â€ â€œWhy yes, I can tell you if thatâ€™s normal poop or not.â€ â€œYes, Iâ€™m a nursing student. No, I donâ€™t want to look at it.â€ â€œIâ€™m 90% caffeine, 10% pretending I know what Iâ€™m doing.â€ â€œIâ€™m a nursing student. I havenâ€™t slept since freshman year.â€ â€œAsk me anything about the Krebs cycleâ€¦JK, please donâ€™t.â€ â€œThey said nursing school would be hard. They werenâ€™t wrong.â€ â€œIf nursing school hasnâ€™t broken you yetâ€¦wait until Med-Surg.â€ â€œThe Holy Trinity of nursing school: Fluids, stress, and sarcasm.â€ â€œIâ€™m one bad test away from googling â€˜how to become a barista.â€™â€ â€œNursing school: Where you find out that â€˜impossibleâ€™ is just an opinion.â€ â€œâ€˜Study breakâ€™ is nursing student code for a 3-minute mental breakdown.â€ â€œBeing a nursing student means never having to say, â€˜Iâ€™m not grossed out.'â€ â€œNursing is not a careerâ€¦ Itâ€™s a post-apocalyptic survival skill.â€ â€” Unknown â€œLaughter is the best medicineâ€¦ except when treating diarrhea.â€ â€” Unknown â€œNursing school: Where your GPA somehow stands for â€˜Great Pain and Agony.â€™â€ â€œWhile thatâ€™s correctâ€¦ itâ€™s not the most correct. This is nursing school.â€ â€” Unknown â€œSurviving nursing school is great and all, but have you ever tried sleeping for 7 hours?â€ â€œThe difference between a good nursing student and a great nursing student is caffeine.â€ â€œAnatomy: Because every student nurse wants to know the exiting path of a cheeseburger.â€ â€œYou know youâ€™re a nursing student when your Friday nights are just you and pathophysiology.â€ â€œPeople who ask me what Iâ€™m doing tomorrow probably assume I even know what day of the week it is.â€ â€” Unknown â€œHow many nurses does it take to screw in a lightbulb? None! They delegate it to the nursing student.â€ â€” Unknown â€œNursing school is a lot like giving birthâ€¦ Once itâ€™s over, you tend to forget just how painful the process really was.â€ â€” Unknown

steps.title: Celebrate a recent grad with a witty and relatable nurse saying.
steps.content: Celebrate a recent grad with a witty and relatable nurse saying. Thereâ€™s no better way to congratulate a nursing school grad than by sharing a silly quote about their experience. Here are the funniest quotes for graduation speeches, Instagram captions, or decorating that grad cap : [4] X Research source â€œPlot twist: Iâ€™m a nurse now.â€ â€œCall me RNâ€”Real Nervous.â€ â€œFully graduated, kinda crashing out .â€ â€œI still donâ€™t know how to fold my scrubsâ€¦â€ â€œ POV : You barely graduated nursing school.â€ â€œFrom scrubs and stress to caps and success!â€ â€œI came. I cared. I conqueredâ€¦and I charted it.â€ â€œGraduated with a BSN and PTSD from clinicals.â€ â€œNow accepting congratulations, cash, and caffeine.â€ â€œYes, I graduated. No, I still donâ€™t want to see your rash.â€ â€œOfficially licensed to save lives (and complain about it).â€ â€œIn need of a nap and a snack before I go save the world.â€ â€œNursing school didnâ€™t kill me, but it made me wish for a DNR.â€ â€œThey gave me a degree and let me near patients. Bold move.â€ â€œIâ€™ve got 99 problems, but a nursing exam ainâ€™t oneâ€¦anymore.â€ â€œTo my fellow nursing grads: Weâ€™ve gone from â€˜ABCsâ€™ to â€˜ABGs.â€™â€ â€œFinally done pretending I knew what was happening in clinicals.â€ â€œI have a degree AND the ability to cry in under 30 seconds. Woo!â€ â€œI graduated with a nursing degree and a minor in crying in my car.â€ â€œShout out to caffeine, group chats, and mild panic attacks. I made it!â€ â€œBlood, sweat, tears, andâ€¦more tears. But hey, Iâ€™ve got a degree now!â€ â€œThey said, â€˜Itâ€™ll be worth it.â€™ They didnâ€™t say Iâ€™d need 50 coffees a week.â€ â€œBehind every great nurse is a student who Googled everything for 4 years.â€ â€œGraduated with a degree in nursing and a minor in crying in the supply closet.â€ â€œNursing graduation: Where the tears of joy rival the tears shed over care plans.â€ â€œMy graduation cap? Itâ€™s a giant Band-Aid to symbolize surviving nursing school.â€ â€œHereâ€™s to the nursing grad who can now decipher a doctorâ€™s handwriting like a pro!â€ â€œWatch out, worldâ€¦new nurse coming through! But seriously, you should be nervous.â€ â€œJust graduated and Iâ€™m already an expert in therapeutic communication (with myself).â€ â€œFinally graduated! Time to update my status from â€˜Student Nurseâ€™ to â€˜Sleep Deprived Nurse.â€™â€

steps.title: Drop a funny saying or quote to crack up your nurse bestie.
steps.content: Drop a funny saying or quote to crack up your nurse bestie. Nursing is a bonding experience, to say the least, and sharing a witty saying is the perfect way to reinforce your friendship and lighten the mood at work. Here are the funniest nurse friendship sayings to revive any shift: [5] X Research source â€œWe speak fluent eye roll.â€ â€œWe go together like tape and IVs.â€ â€œFriends donâ€™t let friends chart alone.â€ â€œWork bestie? More like soulmate in scrubs!â€ â€œIf I flatline, youâ€™re deleting my search history.â€ â€œWe save lives and steal each otherâ€™s snacks!â€ â€œReal friends help you hide in the supply closet.â€ â€œOur friendship is like a latex gloveâ€¦tight and protective.â€ â€œFriends in nursing: We canâ€™t fix crazy, but we can document it.â€ â€œIf we survived the night shift together, we can survive anything.â€ â€œWe donâ€™t need wine nights. We have post-shift parking lot rants.â€ â€œSheâ€™s not just my coworkerâ€¦sheâ€™s my emotional support nurse.â€ â€œOnly a nursing friend will laugh at your jokes, no matter how gross.â€ â€œWe donâ€™t do diamonds. We do vitals, IVs, and late-night venting sessions.â€ â€œNursing friendships are built on mutual respect and shared hand sanitizer.â€ â€œIf you canâ€™t vent to your nurse bestie after a bad shift, are you even friends?â€ â€œA nursing friend is someone whoâ€™s there for you, even during a code brown.â€ â€œWe laugh at things that would get other people fired. Thatâ€™s nurse friendship.â€ â€œA nursing friend knows how to turn your worst day into a slightly less terrible one.â€ â€œOnly a true nursing friend understands the importance of a well-timed coffee break.â€ â€œWith a nursing friend, you donâ€™t need words, just a look, and you burst out laughing.â€ â€œOur idea of â€˜catching upâ€™ is swapping stories about the weirdest patients of the week.â€ â€œWith nursing friends, laughter is just as contagious as MRSA, but much more welcome.â€ â€œA nursing friend is someone you can share your darkest humor with and still get a high five.â€ â€œTrue friendship is texting your nurse bestie at 2 AM what you complained about at 2 PM.â€ â€œSome friends are built on hobbies. Ours was built on trauma bonding and 12-hour shifts.â€ â€œNurse friends understand what you mean when you say â€˜I canâ€™t evenâ€™ while walking into a shift.â€ â€œFriends help you move. Nurse friends help you lift unconscious patients and emotional baggage.â€ â€œYou know youâ€™re real friends when youâ€™ve both used the same stethoscope and donâ€™t freak out.â€ â€œNursing friendships are a different kind of love. Like, â€˜Iâ€™ll hold the butt cheeks while you clean the butt crackâ€™ kind of love!â€ â€” Unknown

steps.title: Share a silly, snappy one-liner to laugh through the chaos.
steps.content: Share a silly, snappy one-liner to laugh through the chaos. A sharp one-liner is like the espresso shot you dream of during a shiftâ€”it instantly wakes you up and helps you make it through the day. Here are some zingy one-liners that are sure to leave you in stitches: [6] X Research source â€œVitals are stable. Iâ€™m not.â€ â€œScrubs on, will to live off.â€ â€œThis is my resting shift face.â€ â€œSaving lives and rolling eyes.â€ â€œI wipe tears, fears, and rears.â€ â€œPowered by coffee and chaos.â€ â€œMy stethoscope hears lies too.â€ â€œI see more butts than a toilet seat.â€ â€œThis nurse is 90% caffeine, 10% sass.â€ â€œI know CPRâ€¦and Iâ€™m not afraid to use it.â€ â€œYou call it a night out. I call it a night shift.â€ â€œNurseâ€™s prescription: 8 oz ETOH q4h PRN.â€ â€œNurses: The real reason doctors look good.â€ â€œIf sarcasm was a medication, Iâ€™d be on a drip.â€ â€œIâ€™m a nurse. Whatâ€™s your excuse for being late?â€ â€œI donâ€™t do drama. I do vitals, meds, and miracles.â€ â€œNurses donâ€™t get mad, we just document thoroughly.â€ â€œYou donâ€™t have to be crazy to work here, but it helps.â€ â€œI have a PhD in patient care and a minor in sarcasm.â€ â€œI didnâ€™t choose the scrub life, the scrub life chose me.â€ â€œMy love language is someone offering to do my vitals.â€ â€œYou donâ€™t need a PhD to know that Iâ€™m the real hero here.â€ â€œIf I had a dollar for every â€˜Nurse!â€™ yelled down a hallwayâ€¦â€ â€œI may not know your name, but I definitely know your vitals.â€ â€œIf you think Iâ€™m bossy, wait until you meet the charge nurse.â€ â€œNever upset a pediatric nurse. They have very little patients.â€ â€œNurse life: Where coffee is a food group and sleep is a myth.â€ â€œI donâ€™t need a vacationâ€¦I need 12 uninterrupted hours of sleep!â€ â€œIâ€™m not a magician, but I can make your pain disappearâ€¦eventually.â€ â€œBeing a nurse is like tying your shoeâ€¦except the laces are on fire and so are you.â€

steps.title: Tell your patient a funny joke or quip to ease their mind.
steps.content: Tell your patient a funny joke or quip to ease their mind. Looking for a way to calm down your patients and lighten the mood? Share any of the following lines to reduce tension and make them feel comfortable: â€œI bring drugsâ€¦legally.â€ â€œYour bodyâ€™s being dramatic again.â€ â€œIâ€™ll be back in 10 hospital minutes.â€ â€œCan I legally get you anything else?â€ â€œYou take the meds, Iâ€™ll take the credit.â€ â€œIâ€™m not a doctor, but I do watch one on TV.â€ â€œIâ€™m basically your hospital tour guideâ€¦with needles.â€ â€œYouâ€™re my favorite patient todayâ€¦ Donâ€™t tell the others!â€ â€œIf anything weird happens, blame it on the hospital food.â€ â€œYouâ€™re doing great! Better than me before my third coffee.â€ â€œDonâ€™t worryâ€¦I watched a YouTube tutorial right before this.â€ When sending a patient for an X-ray: â€œSmile for the camera.â€ â€œGood news! Your blood pressure is better than my dating life.â€ Patient: â€œIs this going to hurt?â€ Nurse: â€œNo, I wonâ€™t feel a thing.â€ When injecting a patient: â€œYouâ€™re my favorite pin cushion today.â€ â€œLet me check your pulse to see if youâ€™re still putting up with me.â€ â€œYouâ€™re doing better than my last patient, but donâ€™t tell them that.â€ â€œNo need to worryâ€”Iâ€™ve seen more chaos than a reality TV show!â€ â€œWeâ€™re going to take good care of youâ€¦just let me finish my snack first.â€ â€œDonâ€™t worry, Iâ€™ve watched too many episodes of Greyâ€™s Anatomy for this.â€ â€œI know youâ€™re not feeling great, but at least you donâ€™t have to do paperwork!â€ â€œYou just close your eyes and Iâ€™ll close mine, and itâ€™ll be over before we know it!â€ When transporting a patient in a wheelchair: â€œHow do you feel about drifting?â€ â€œThink of this as a free spa dayâ€¦just with fewer cucumbers and more bandages.â€ When flushing a patientâ€™s line: â€œAlright, Iâ€™m injecting $20 into your bloodstream.â€ â€œIâ€™ll be your nurse todayâ€¦unless you make me mad. Then, youâ€™ll get my evil twin.â€ â€œIâ€™m here to make you feel better, but I need you to stop Googling your symptoms first.â€ Nurse: â€œAre you afraid of needles?â€ Patient: â€œNo.â€ Nurse: â€œI wish I could say the same.â€ Older patient struggling to stand: â€œDonâ€™t ever get old.â€ Nurse: â€œWell, it beats the alternative.â€ When wheeling a patient through a doorway: â€œPlease keep your hands and feet inside the ride at all times, and no flash photography.â€

steps.title: Spice up your Instagram post with a funny nurse caption.
steps.content: Spice up your Instagram post with a funny nurse caption. Instagram is the perfect place to show off the #NurseLifeâ€¦and your sparkling sense of humor. Here are some silly, punny, and relatable caption ideas to get the giggles going: Send help. Tired but wired. Vitals before titles. Us ğŸ¤ patient drama Sponsored by scrubs. Not easily grossed out. Cold hands, warm heart. Patient care is my cardio. I came. I cared. I charted. Saving lives and taking names. If love canâ€™t cure it, nurses can. Vitals? Fine. Me? Not so much. Nurse by day, superhero by night. Nurses are angels in comfy shoes. Yes I charted. No it wasnâ€™t accurate. Fluent in medical jargon and sarcasm. CPR certified, emotionally unavailable. Running on coffee, chaos, and a prayer. Not all angels wear wings. Some wear scrubs. If coffee were a vital sign, Iâ€™d be on life support. The only thing ugly about nurses is their shoes. Meds and microaggressions. #justnursethings ğŸ¤ª Me clocking in like itâ€™s not about to be a battlefield. Shift got me like: ğŸ˜­ğŸ« ğŸ’€ğŸ™„ğŸ™ƒğŸ˜µâ€ğŸ’«ğŸ˜‘ğŸ¤¡ğŸ¥±ğŸ˜¤ğŸ¤¬ğŸ˜– I save lives, but I also save my sanity with memes. Coffee first, save lives seconds, charting third. Repeat. Nursing is lke a regular job, but with more bodily fluids. Iâ€™m the calm in your stormâ€¦until I have to find the vein. I save lives. I also save your dignity when you forget to zip your gown. One day Iâ€™ll find the perfect vein, and the whole world will know my name.

steps.title: Make everyone laugh out loud with a funny nurse joke.
steps.content: Make everyone laugh out loud with a funny nurse joke. From classic knock-knock jokes to punny one-liners, thereâ€™s a nurse joke for every mood and situation. Here are some great options to share during your next shift: [7] X Research source What do transplant nurses hate? Rejection. Whatâ€™s a nurseâ€™s favorite game? Hide and go chart. What did the cookie say to the nurse? â€œI feel crumby.â€ Why did the nurse need a red crayon? To draw blood. Whatâ€™s a nurseâ€™s favorite vital sign? The one that behaves! Why are nurses afraid of the outdoors? Too much poison IV. What do you call a nurse who is relaxed and smiling? Off duty! Knock-knock. Whoâ€™s there? HIPAA. HIPAA who? I canâ€™t tell you that. What did the nurse cross the road? To silence the IV pump on the other side. What did the nurse say when the doctor decided to stay home? â€œSuture self!â€ What did Dracula say to the nurse? â€œPlease call the doctor. I canâ€™t stop coffin.â€ Whatâ€™s it called when a hospital runs out of maternity nurses? A midwife crisis. Why are night nurses such bad dancers? Their circadian rhythm is generally off. All the nurses are dressing up as witches for Halloween! They will be caretakers. Whatâ€™s a nurseâ€™s least favorite room? The break roomâ€¦becuase theyâ€™re never in it! What do you tell a nurse when she administers an injection painlessly? â€œGood jab!â€ Why didnâ€™t one nurse find the other nurseâ€™s joke funny? She had an irony deficiency. What did the balloon say to the nurse during a routine checkup? â€œI feel light-headed.â€ How do you know when a nurse is having a bad day? She wonâ€™t stop needling people. What did the banana say to the nurse? â€œIâ€™m here to see the doctor. Iâ€™m not peeling well.â€ I asked my wife to dress up as a nurse tonightâ€¦ to fulfill my fantasy that we have health care. The local hospital hired a Roman nurse. Complications arose when the IV was issued to bed #4. Had to wait ages for my X-ray today at the hospital. There was only a skeleton staff working. What did the blood donor say to the nurse? â€œI feel super tired; it is such a draining process.â€ How many nurses does it take to screw in a light bulb? None. They just have a nursing student do it. I used to get heartburn when I ate birthday cake until a nurse advised me to take the candles off first. What do a nurse and a wood frog have in common? They can both hold their bladder for a really long time. What did the patient say when the nurse informed him that he had acute appendix? â€œCompared to whom?â€ What did the nurse say to the tonsil? â€œYou should get dressed, because the doctor is going to take you out.â€ What did the nurse say to the man who fainted at the airport terminal? â€œI think you might have a terminal illness.â€ A man speaks frantically into the phone, â€œMy wife is pregnant and her contractions are only two minutes apart!â€ â€œIs this her first child?â€ the nurse asks. â€œNo! Itâ€™s her husband!â€ I had to take my son to the hospital after he swallowed ten quarters. He was rushed to surgery. After half an hour I saw a nurse so I asked her how he was. She said, â€œThereâ€™s no change yet.â€ A nurse, a doctor, and an anti-vaxxer walk into a bar. The nurse sits down at the bar and says, â€œIâ€™ll have a Bloody Mary!â€ The doctor sits next to her and says, â€œGive me a rum and coke!â€ The anti-vaxxer says, â€œNo shots for me.â€

steps.title: Motivate yourself and others with an inspirational nurse saying.
steps.content: Motivate yourself and others with an inspirational nurse saying. When youâ€™re dealing with burnout, grief, trauma, or exhaustion, it can be difficult to make it through the day. Here are some empowering and inspirational nurse quotes to remind you why nurses are the heart of healthcare: [8] X Research source â€œWe only have what we give.â€ â€” Isabel Allende â€œCaring is the essence of nursing.â€ â€” Jean Watson â€œTreat every patient like they are family.â€ â€” Unknown â€œBe the nurse you would want as a patient.â€ â€” Unknown â€œNursing: The toughest job youâ€™ll ever love.â€ â€” Unknown â€œBe kind, for everyone you meet is fighting a battle.â€ â€” Plato â€œValue what you do and add value by what you do.â€ â€” Unknown â€œNursesâ€”one of the few blessings of being ill.â€ â€” Sara Moss-Wolfe â€œWhat angels are to the sad, nurses are to the sick.â€ â€” Amit Kalantri â€œA nurse will always give us hope, an angel with a stethoscope.â€ â€” Carrie Latet â€œSuccess comes to those who are too busy to look for it.â€ â€” Henry David Thoreau â€œAmericaâ€™s nurses are the beating heart of our medical system.â€ â€” Barack Obama â€œLet no one ever come to you without leaving better and happier.â€ â€” Mother Teresa â€œThe best way to find yourself is to lose yourself in the service of others.â€ â€” Mahatma Gandhi â€œNurses dispense comfort, compassion, and caring without even a prescription.â€ â€” Val Saintsbury â€œNursing is one of the fine arts: I had almost said â€˜the finest of fine arts.â€™â€ â€” Florence Nightingale â€œThere no longer has to be a difference between who you are and what you do.â€ â€” Gary Vaynerchuk â€œThey may forget your name, but they will never forget how you made them feel.â€ â€” Maya Angelou â€œThe character of the nurse is as important as the knowledge she possesses.â€ â€” Carolyn Jarvis â€œHave a heart that never hardens, a temper that never tires, a touch that never hurts.â€ â€” Charles Dickens â€œNursing is not for the faint of heart; it requires strength, endurance, and an unwavering spirit.â€ â€” Unknown â€œWhen youâ€™re a nurse, you know that every day you will touch a life or a life will touch yours.â€ â€” Unknown â€œYou have not lived today until you have done something for someone who can never repay you.â€ â€” John Bunyan â€œEvery nurse was drawn to nursing because of a desire to care, to serve, or to help.â€ â€” Christina Feist-Heilmeier, RN â€œConstant attention by a good nurse may be just as important as a major operation by a surgeon.â€ â€” Dag HammarskjÃ¶ld â€œYour worth consists in what you are, and not in what you have. What you are will show in what you do.â€ â€” Thomas Davidson â€œTo know even one life has breathed easier because you have lived. This is to have succeeded.â€ â€” Ralph Waldo Emerson â€œOur job as nurses is to cushion the sorrow and celebrate the job, every day, while we are â€˜just doing our jobs.â€™â€ â€” Christine Belle â€œNurse: Just another word to describe a person strong enough to tolerate anything and soft enough to understand anyone.â€ â€” Unknown â€œThe trained nurse has become one of the great blessings of humanity, taking a place beside the physician and the priest.â€ â€” Dr. William Osler â€œYour profession is not what brings home your paycheck. Your profession is what you were put on Earth to do with such passion and such intensity that it becomes spiritual in calling.â€ â€” Vincent Van Gogh

steps.title: These quotes about nurses are moving and empowering.
steps.content: These quotes about nurses are moving and empowering. Nurses are some of the bravest and most hardworking people in the world. Check out these quotes from famous thinkers on the role and power of nurses: [9] X Research source â€œOur fingerprints donâ€™t fade from the lives we touch.â€ â€” Judy Blume â€œIt would not be possible to praise nurses too highly.â€ â€” Stephen Ambrose â€œLet us never consider ourselves finished, nurses. We must be learning all of our lives.â€ â€” Florence Nightingale â€œBound by paperwork, short on hands, sleep, and energyâ€¦nurses are rarely short on caring.â€ â€” Sharon Hudacek â€œRemember, nurses are like icebergs. At any one time, you are only seeing what they are actually doing.â€ â€” Ian Miller â€œThe doctors may be mapping out the war games, but it is the nurses who make the conflict bearable.â€ â€” Jodi Picoult â€œNurses are a unique kind. They have this insatiable need to care for others, which is both their biggest strength and fatal flaw.â€ â€” Dr. Jean Watson â€œA nurse is one who opens the eyes of a newborn and gently closes the eyes of a dying man. It is indeed a high blessing to be the first and last to witness the beginning and end of life.â€ â€” Unknown â€œThe nurse is temporarily the consciousness of the unconscious, the love of life of the suicidal, the leg of the amputee, the eyes of the newly blind, a means of locomotion for the newborn, knowledge, and confidence for the young mother, a voice for those too weak to speak, and so on.â€ â€” Virginia Henderson, RN

steps.title: These quotes prove laughter is the best medicine.
steps.content: These quotes prove laughter is the best medicine. Looking for a laugh? Try these silly and clever quotes about general health and healthcare: [10] X Research source â€œQuit worrying about your health. Itâ€™ll go away.â€ â€” Robert Orben â€œNever go to a doctor whose office plants have died.â€ â€” Erma Bombeck â€œI am dying with the help of too many physicians.â€ â€” Alexander the Great â€œIsnâ€™t it a bit unnerving that doctors call what they do practice?â€ â€” George Carlin â€œReality is the leading cause of stress among those in touch with it.â€ â€” Lily Tomlin â€œBe careful about reading health books. You may die of a misprint.â€ â€” Mark Twain â€œHealth nuts are going to feel stupid someday, lying in hospitals dying of nothing.â€ â€” Redd Foxx â€œOlder people shouldn't eat health food. They need all the preservatives they can get.â€ â€” Robert Orben â€œItâ€™s no longer a question of staying healthy. Itâ€™s a question of finding a sickness you like.â€ â€” Jackie Mason â€œMy doctor recently told me that jogging could add years to my life. I think he was right. I feel ten years older already.â€ â€” Milton Berle

steps.title: Humor can help you deal with the stress and challenges of nursing.
steps.content: Humor can help you deal with the stress and challenges of nursing. Itâ€™s no secret that nursing is an emotionally and physically demanding job, and a well-timed joke or funny saying can help you decompress after an intense moment or long, grueling shift. In fact, studies show that laughter can reduce stress, relax your muscles, boost your immune system, and increase the endorphins released by your brain! [11] X Research source Additionally, sharing a funny quote with a fellow nurse can strengthen your bond, while sharing a silly saying or quip with a patient can help ease their anxieties.
